localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. ⠀ It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.
blogPost.body: Stonksfolio is a free community-supported project that makes it easy to track multiple stock, ETF and crypto investments in a single place. ⠀ It shows historical performance and a number of useful metrics that can help you decide how to tune your investments.
blogPost.title: Stonksfolio - Gain insight into the performance of stock & ETF investments
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Stonksfolio是一个由社区支持的免费项目，它可以在一个地方轻松跟踪多种股票、ETF和加密投资。⠀它显示了历史业绩和一些有用的指标，可以帮助你决定如何调整你的投资。
localize.tagline: 深入了解股票和ETF的投资表现。

localize.description: Stonksfolio是一個由社區支持的免費項目，它可以在一個地方輕鬆跟蹤多種股票、ETF和加密投資。⠀它顯示了歷史業績和一些有用的指標，可以幫助你決定如何調整你的投資。
localize.tagline: 深入瞭解股票和ETF的投資表現。

previous.excerpt: With Multistream Studio you can simultaneously broadcast to multiple live video services while using your favourite app (like OBS or Zoom), video camera, hardware encoder or mobile phone. It acts like a middleman copying your stream to multiple destinations.
previous.title: Multistream Studio - Broadcast to multiple video services from any software

localize.description: 有了Multistream Studio，你可以在使用你最喜欢的应用程序（如OBS或Zoom）、摄像机、硬件编码器或手机时，同时向多个视频直播服务进行广播。它就像一个中间人，将你的视频流复制到多个目的地。
localize.tagline: 从任何软件广播到多个视频服务

localize.description: 有了Multistream Studio，你可以在使用你最喜歡的應用程序（如OBS或Zoom）、攝像機、硬件編碼器或手機時，同時向多個視頻直播服務進行廣播。它就像一箇中間人，將你的視頻流複製到多個目的地。
localize.tagline: 從任何軟件廣播到多個視頻服務

next.excerpt: Preki is a B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam, where retailers can source goods through a mobile app and direct vendor links. Their mission is to help both retailers and vendors grow their businesses and offer them the tools necessary to do just that.
next.title: Preki - B2B wholesale marketplace in Latam

localize.description: Preki是拉脱维亚的B2B批发市场，零售商可以通过移动应用和直接的供应商链接采购商品。他们的使命是帮助零售商和供应商发展他们的业务，并为他们提供必要的工具来实现这一目标。
Preki是拉脫維亞的B2B批發市場，零售商可以通過移動應用和直接的供應商鏈接採購商品。他們的使命是幫助零售商和供應商發展他們的業務，併爲他們提供必要的工具來實現這一目標。
